title: BRIEF-Oilex Says Reached Agreement To Resolve Cambay PSC Dispute
text:
BRIEF-Oilex Says Reached Agreement To Resolve Cambay PSC Dispute

Stock Markets 21 minutes ago (Sep 09, 2019 13:50)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Oilex Says Reached Agreement To Resolve Cambay PSC Dispute Sept 9 (Reuters) - Oilex Ltd : * REACHED AGREEMENT WITH GUJARAT STATE PETROLEUM CORPORATION WHICH, UPON COMPLETION, WILL RESOLVE ONGOING CAMBAY PSC DISPUTE * EVENT OF DEFAULT DECLARED BY OILEX PURSUANT TO CAMBAY FIELD JOINT OPERATING AGREEMENT HAS BEEN WITHDRAWN * GSPC WILL TERMINATE ARBITRATION PROCEEDINGS WITH SINGAPORE INTERNATIONAL ARBITRATION CENTRE, REMOVE STAY ORDER GRANTED IN GUJARAT HIGH COURT

BRIEF-Oilex Says Reached Agreement To Resolve Cambay PSC Dispute
description: BRIEF-Oilex Says Reached Agreement To Resolve Cambay PSC Dispute
